title: Final Boss: Shadow Running towards the Light - Novel Updates

description:
Kang Sung-Tae, who lost both his parents and his memories before primary school. 

'You bad guy, you graduated!'

'Aunt, aunt. I don’t think I can get this money.'

'Here you go, punk. If you don’t want your aunt to be upset, you can’t refuse.'

There was a place I wanted to go…>
